New Records: LeBron James officially joined Vince Carter as the only players in NBA history to play in 22 seasons.
Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together
Anthony Davis had a dominant performance with 36 points and 16 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Experts likely did not predict this outcome given the historical significance of the matchup
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick won his head coaching debut for the Lakers
The Lakers played disciplined ball on both ends and got organized defense led by Davis
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time a father and son played in the NBA together
Bronny James made his NBA debut
The Timberwolves are coming off their best season in 20 years
